attributes.action: Enact legislation to remove illegal traveller sites within 48 hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Zero tolerance of illegal traveller sites,enact laws if necessary to ensure illegal traveller sites are cleared within 48 hours of a site being set up.
Tax payers have paid for legal traveller sites so illegal sites with costs for waste disposal and clear up should not be borne by tax payers.
North Yorks County Council is prepared to let illegal traveller sites exist indefinitely
